title: Cant connect to server
body: All is says is cant connect to server. I am connected to public wifi. I have tried all the suggestion nothing is working.{{champion:32}}

replies.body: Is this still happening?  Your public wifi might have some security settings up that are blocking you from reaching the authentication server.  If you're able to reach out to your wifi's admin, the steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide can help update firewall settings or any other blocks along the way.
